Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/112th Place
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie,111th, Pulaski and 115th: due to street blockage near Kedzie/112th Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 111th, Pulaski, 115th and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/112th Place.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
